definition[0]: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another
example[0]: The city needs to improve its public transportation (=buses, trains etc).
example[1]: People need to get out of their cars and use other modes of transportation.
definition[1]: the process or business of taking goods from one place to another
example[2]: the transportation of dangerous chemicals by road
definition[2]: the punishment of sending a criminal to a distant country, especially Australia, in the past
definition[3]: the process or business of moving goods from one place to another by rail, air, ship etc
definition[4]: a system for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another
example[4]: Passengers who want information about alternate forms of transportation can call the information helpdesk.
